selection_reasoning: Selected a balanced mix of top historical performers and promising approaches from generation 11. While none of the current generation trials exceeded our historical best, trial_11_1 came close with its sophisticated multi-stage optimization. The selection maintains our best-performing algorithms (trial_8_2 and trial_10_1) while incorporating novel geometric approaches with trial_11_7 (pattern-based) and trial_11_3 (Voronoi + physics). The diverse techniques in these trials provide complementary strategies that could lead to breakthroughs when combined or refined in future generations.

trial_selections.reasoning: Historical best performing trial with score 2.634292, still outperforming current generation trials
Second-best historical trial with nearly identical score to our best, provides algorithmic stability
Best performing trial from generation 11 with a score of 2.630215, using sophisticated multi-stage optimization with adaptive step-taking
Introduces a novel hybrid pattern-based initialization with strategic perturbations that breaks symmetry in clever ways
Employs Voronoi initialization and physics-based relaxation, offering a fundamentally different geometric approach
